title: Inkscapetober Day 25: Splat
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Inkscapetober Day 25:** Splat
**Author:** [[*user SleepOfReason]]
Check out more art [[[SleepOfReason creates art| here]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]


[[=image hungrypossum.png]]


**Subject:** hungrypossum

**Commentary:** This coat of arms doesn't need much explaining. Depicted on the shield is a muddy horse on some grass, a reference to [[[SCP-6169]]]. The choice for the supporters is obvious. These supporters, or at least their heads, are pretty much created from scratch; something that is more uncommon in this series than I'd like. But alas, there's more work to be done.

**How the prompt fits in:** It is a bit of a stretch, but I'd say that if the galloping of this horse made a sound, it would be 'splat'. You know, because of all the mud.

@@ @@
